short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension changes the page to utilize the entire screen width for better visibility.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension does not change any site functionality, but merely modifies the styles of certain elements to make the book take up the entire screen width for easier reading.
